page.title: 19 ASH HOUSE
page.content: Ash House is an old peoples home kept by{Mr & Mrs Mosedale}.The Mosedales have lived in Ash House for eight years.There are three full_time workers,one full_time cook,one relief cook and seven part_time workers.The helpers work from 8a.m. to five in the evening. Starting from this year you have to have qualifications to run an old peoples home.{Mrs J Mosedale}works as a health visitor as well as running an old peoples home.The greatest number of residents they have had at one time is nine. If an old person becomes ill they are looked after until they are better or until they die.The residents have visitors occasionally.Each week Canon Stephenson has a service for the residents. Susan Mosedale.
